project.description:
This script triggers the Random Trades generator in: /opt/apps/Python/batched/0_TradesGenerator
to trigger the main.py script poetry run command is used in conjunction with 3 args working directory, config and params file

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: cd /opt/apps/batched/Python/0_RandomTrades if [ ! -f "poetry.lock" ]; then echo "poetry.lock not found. Running 'poetry install'..." poetry install else echo "poetry.lock found. Skipping 'poetry install'." fi poetry run python main.py --date_run='2023-11-23' --env_type='dev' --output_file='csv'
